div.style: width: 100%; padding: 0; margin: 0; font-size: 21px; font-weight: bold;

div.t-att-style: 'border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); width: %s; height: %s; margin-top: 10px; padding: 2px; background-color: %s;' % (label_width or '120mm', label_height or '60mm', bg_color)

div.style: width: 75%; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-radius: 5px; border: 2px solid #000000; text-align: center;margin-top:{{padding_price}};

div.t-attf-style: width:100%; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); margin-top:{{padding_price}}; border-radius:10px 10px 0px 0px; border:2px solid #000000;height:{{height_Bar}};

div.t-att-style: 'border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); width: %s; height: %s; margin-top: 10px; padding: 2px; background-color: %s;' % (label_width or '120mm', label_height or '60mm', bg_color)

div.style: width: 75%; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-radius: 5px; border: 2px solid #000000; text-align: center;margin-top:{{padding_price}};

div.t-attf-style: width:100%; background-color:rgb(255,255,255); margin-top:{{padding_price}}; border-radius:10px 10px 0px 0px; border:2px solid #000000;height:{{height_Bar}};

div.t-att-style: 'border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); width: %s; height: %s; margin-top: 10px; padding: 2px; background-color:rgb(255, 226, 188);' % (label_width or '120mm', label_height or '60mm')
'float: left; margin: 0 4px 4px; border: {};'.format('%dpx solid #777;' % label.wizard_id.border_width if label.wizard_id.border_width else '0')
' float: left; margin: 0 4px 4px; border: {};'.format('%dpx solid #777;' % label.wizard_id.border_width if label.wizard_id.border_width else '0')
' float: left; margin: 0 4px 4px; border: {};'.format('%dpx solid #777;' % label.wizard_id.border_width if label.wizard_id.border_width else '0')
' float: left; margin: 0 4px 4px; border: {};'.format('%dpx solid #777;' % label.wizard_id.border_width if label.wizard_id.border_width else '0')
'width: 376px; float: left; margin: -5px 0 4px 4px; border: {};'.format('%dpx solid #777;' % label.wizard_id.border_width if label.wizard_id.border_width else '0')
' width: 372px;float: left; margin: 0 4px 4px; border: {};'.format('%dpx solid #777;' % label.wizard_id.border_width if label.wizard_id.border_width else '0')
'width: 200px; float: left; margin: 0 4px 4px; border: {};'.format('%dpx solid #777;' % label.wizard_id.border_width if label.wizard_id.border_width else '0')
